definitions.define: Incorrect username or password, please try again
First name and password do not match our records!
You have tried over 3 times. For security reasons, please contact your Web Administrator to get new password.
The new password have sent to your email address. Please check your email and click back to login.

Hi %s,

You can access the admin panel with the following password. Once you access the admin, please change your password!

Website : %s
Username: %s
Password: %s

Thanks!
